View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.oracle;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
5   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteOracleSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteOracleSuiteIT() {
10          this.config();
11      }
12      
13      public void config() {
14          this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@jsql-oracle:1521:XE";
15          this.jdbcUser = "system";
16          this.jdbcPass = "Password1_One";
17          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "XDB";
18          this.jsqlTableName = "APP_USERS_AND_ROLES";
19          this.jsqlColumnName = "NAME";
20          
21          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "owner";
22          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "table_name";
23          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "column_name";
24          
25          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "SELECT distinct owner FROM all_tables";
26          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "SELECT distinct table_name FROM all_tables where owner='XDB'";
27          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames = "SELECT distinct column_name FROM all_tab_columns where owner='XDB' and table_name='APP_USERS_AND_ROLES'";
28          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "SELECT distinct NAME FROM XDB.APP_USERS_AND_ROLES";
29      }
30  
31      @AfterEach
32      public void checkVendor() {
33          Assertions.assertEquals(
34              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getOracle(),
35              this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getVendor()
36          );
37      }
38  }
